title: Revenue of Mattel 's Barbie brand worldwide from 2012 to 2019
yAxis: Gross sales in million U.S. dollars
summary: The timeline presents the League of Legends world championships prize pool from 2012 to 2019 . In 2019 , the lol world Championship , which took place in various cities across France , Germany , and Spain , had a prize pool of 2.23 million u.s. dollars , down from 6.45 million a year earlier .
